Tips from Jay Jay Keller and associates incorporated on customer service getting pulled over for an inspection by law enforcement personnel is not a moment that drivers look forward to not only can an inspection set a driver back in their schedule
The results of the inspection could mean serious issues for both the driver and the company the potential for a truck being stopped to undergo an inspection always exists
Here are some chips to help ensure the process goes more smoothly remain visible and cooperative don't give the inspector a reason to be suspicious have the required documents like your commercial driver's license your medical card your vehicles registration your hours of service in low details
And had them all organized and readily available be professional remember that the inspectors are simply doing their jobs drivers were courteous and respectful help the process move along faster this tip was brought to you by Jay Jay Keller and associates incorporated visit us on Jay Jay Keller dot com
